name: Minor fixes

name: Custom Modules
body:
- Custom modules for self-host installs | [Watch Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8jJ-PYuq85k)
- Support filtering tables by status
- Added bulk actions to client overview page
- Support setting task project
- Enable editing existing credit
- Support redirect URL with buy now buttons
- Hide new draft invoices from the client portal 
- Support exporting products and expenses
- Added keyboard shortcuts
- Support bulk mark sent/paid

Note: with this release invoices created through the API are marked as sent, to create them as draft you need to set is_public to false.

name: Braintree and Stripe ACH
body:
- Support Braintree - Thanks [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire)!
- Support ACH payments with Stripe and Plaid - Thanks [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire)!
- Support processing payment refunds - Thanks [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire)!
- Store last 4 card digits and expiration - Thanks [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire)!
- Client portal link for each contact - Thanks [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire)!
- Configuration for first day of the week #950 - Thanks [Holger Lösken](https://github.com/codedge)!
- Support manually importing OFX files
- Support importing products from CSV file
- Support expense taxes and categories
- Enabled importing JSON file

body:

name: Minor fixes
body: - Due date was unset for recurring invoices #627

body:
- Resolved problem when using Postmark to send emails #625

name: Custom Fonts
body:
- Added support for custom fonts
- Due date setting for recurring invoices
- Enabled sending reminders before/after the due date or after the invoice date
- Added support for Chinese
- Custom CSS for the client portal

Many of these features were implemented by [Joshua Dwire](https://github.com/joshuadwire) - [Some Techie](https://www.sometechie.com). Thanks for contributing to our project!!

name: Minor improvements
body:
- Enabled sending reminders before/after the due date or after the invoice date
- Bug fixes

name: HTML Email Designs
body:
- Added HTML email designs
- Implemented date/time picker for tasks 
- Localization improvements to currency formatting 
- Enabled importing data from other providers 
- Added company website to the invoice, client portal and email footer

name: Improved Import/Export
body:
- Enabled importing invoices and payments
- Improved data export 
- Added support for Stripe.js 
- Enabled grouping report by payments 
- Added FreshBooks data import
- Added JSON 1.0 support to the API
- Implemented API pagination and includes

Note: the API now returns the response under a 'data' index in order to support metadata.

name: Added QuillJS
body:
- Implemented [QuillJS](http://quilljs.com/) for email signature and templates
- Added system settings page for self hosters
- Added additional OmniPay drivers 
- Added Swagger API docs

name: Default tax rates and custom invoice numbers
body:
- Support for default invoice/product tax rates
- Custom invoice/quote numbers using patterns
- Enabled restoring deleted invoices and payments
- Custom quote terms
- Added Gitter chat to dashboard

name: Client Dashboard
body:
- Client dashboard
- Improved settings navigation
- Custom invoice fields
- Social/one-click login 
- Capturing email open and bounce (w/Postmark)
- Displaying future recurring schedule

name: Basic Markdown Support
body:
- Basic markdown support
- Added Google map to the client page
- Added quotes to the dashboard
- No longer need to load /update after upgrading

name: Auto-Reminders and Auto-Billing
body:
- Added auto-reminder emails 
- Enabled auto-billing for recurring invoices 
- Enabled attaching recurring invoice PDFs to emails
- Enabled displaying our app within an iFrame on a user’s site
- Client specific languages
- Added option to show line item taxes inline in the PDF
- Enabled specifying the email subject 
- Changed quote ‘due date’ to ‘valid until’
- Added support for 24 hour time
- Enabled adjusting the date of the next recurring invoicing 
- Improved international address formatting 
- Improved client search when creating an invoice or quote 
- API improvements: support for tasks and filtering by clients 
- Added a referral program 
- Resolved problems with the eWAY and MIGS payment gateways

name: Minor improvements
body: - Automated tests using Codeception and PhantomJS

name: Minor improvements
body:
- Moved line item tax amounts to invoice subtotals section
- Recurring invoices no longer prevent invoice numbers from being sequential 
- Corrected interface language when viewed as client

name: Multi-company support and custom invoice designs
body:
- Multi-company support
- Enabled customizing invoice designs 
- Added native support for png logos 
- Improved editing task date/time details 
- Enabled adding a task to an existing invoice 
- Added option to show/hide the billing address on the payment form
- Enhancements to the dashboard
- API improvements

name: Minor improvements
body:
- Enabled resuming tasks
- Enabled sending confirmation email for manual payment entries

name: Minor fixes
body:
- Adjusted invoice item header labels for invoices created from tasks
- Ensured task timer is correct regardless of user's time
- Set debug to false by default

name: Dwolla Support
body:
- Added support for Dwolla
- Enabled date variables for notes, terms and footer
- Added custom company fields to Cyrillic PDFs
- Bug fixes (thanks @bcole808)

name: Minor bug fixes
body:
- Simplified the upgrade process to v2.1.x
- Fixed error displaying the invoice design page

name: Tasks and Time Tracking
body:
- Implemented tasks w/time-tracking
- Enabled setting custom invoice item labels
- Added the ability to set the PDF font size
- Added support for the Postmark API

name: API Improvements
body:
- API improvements 
- Added link to view client from invoice create/edit page
- Minor bug fixes

name: Version 2.0
body:
- Upgraded to Laravel 5 (thanks @JeramyMywork)
- Added PDF support for Cyrillic alphabets plus others (thanks @sigitas)
- Added support for custom subdomains
- Enabled attaching the PDF to emails (thanks @vrennert)
- Added support for partial payments
- Added support for Bitcoin using https://bitpay.com/
- Implemented basic reports
- Added Swedish language (thanks @bang75)
- Added Spanish - Spain language (thanks @raccarab)
- Added French - Canadian language (thanks @MagicFab)
- Added email notification when a quote is approved
- Added option to disable auto line wrapping in PDFs
- Enabled re-sending account confirmation email 
- Enabled setting test/developer modes for payment gateways
- Contact name can be used in place of email when creating a client

### Upgrade notes
- Copy .env.example to .env and set config settings
- Set the app cipher to rijndael-256 to support existing passwords
- Check that /path/to/ninja/storage has 755 permissions

name: Bug fixes
body: - Fixed problem where default account currency wasn't being used if the client currency was unset.

name: Bug fixes
body: - Fixes a problem which prevented certain invoice changes from being tracked in the activity log

name: Email Templates and API/Tokens
body:
- Enabled customizing email templates 
- Added support for Stripe token billing 
- Enabled setting an invoice footer
- Redesigned client payment page 
- Enabled creating and emailing invoices through the API
- Added support for an additional payment gateway (paypal + credit card)
- Added ability for clients to approve a quote, converting it to an invoice 
- Added support for changing the user’s password
- Enabled restoring users and re-sending invitations 
- Added support for API tokens
- Added ability to edit payments details 
- Corrected historical activity records and cached client balances/paid to date
- Client pages color now matches the invoice design primary color

name: Minor improvements and bug fixes
body:
- Enabled viewing previous versions of invoices and quotes 
- Added ability to save and show 0% tax rates
- Upgraded to the latest version of Bootstrap 
- Fix: removed quotes from the dashboard calculations https://github.com/hillelcoren/invoice-ninja/issues/205
- Fix: Glyphicons not showing https://github.com/hillelcoren/invoice-ninja/issues/204
- Fix: Multiple currency support in dashboard https://github.com/hillelcoren/invoice-ninja/pull/218 (Thanks @sanglt)

name: Enabled restoring archived records
body:
- Enabled restoring archived clients, invoice, quotes, payments and credits 
- Added support for 10 new payment providers 
- Enabled setting a fixed amount discount 
- If invoice prefix is different than the quote prefix then the same number is used when cloning
- Recurring option is now hidden for existing invoices 
- Invoices are now individualized for the selected contact
- Added support for negative line item amounts 
- Created a setup page for self-hosters

name: Added client pages
body:
- Created quotes, invoices and payments pages for clients 
- Invoice NInja footers are now hidden in the client pages 
- Enabled leaving the client currency blank so the company selection is used
- Changed email headers to support DMARC
- Set invoice date to today when cloning 
- Improved self-host initial setup
- Added support for a white label license to remove Invoice Ninja branding

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Improved new invoice design layouts
- Minor bug fixes

name: New invoice designs for Pro users
body:
- New invoice designs for Pro users
- Added invoice and quote number prefixes and counters 
- Added live PDF preview to invoice design page
- Moved custom client and company fields to their respective sections on the PDF
- Enabled manually setting invoices and quotes as sent
- Fixed bug where incorrect credit balance was updated when the credit was applied
- Added support for Spanish
- Added invoice tax percent to the PDF
- Enabled using date variables for non-recurring invoices

name: D3.js data visualizations
body:
- D3.js data visualizations
- Added moolah as recommended payment gateway
- Version check and news feed messages
- Added confirmation email for license purchases 
- Enabled web based database install and upgrade

name: Bug fixes

- Added confirmation if recurring is enabled when saving an invoice
- Added the ability to cancel an account
- Resolved issue when sending emails from yahoo or aol email accounts
- Resolved issue when deleting an archived record
- Modified dashboard calculations to include archived records
- Enabled updating accepted credit cards without re-entering payment credentials
- Resolved problem when updating company details as an additional user

name: Bug fixes

- Enabled support for MySQL strict mode (thanks @sdebacker)
- Fixed bug where recurring invoices were incorrectly adding to the client balance

name: Zapier Support

name: Multi-user support

- Multi user support

- Support hiding paid to date until a payment is made

- Show credit card logos on payment page

- Quotes/Pro-Forma Invoices

- Bug fixes and tweaks...

- Enabled setting the transaction reference field when creating a payment

name: Performance improvements
body:
- Improved page load times
- Added custom invoice colors to the Pro plan

name: Product Library and the Pro plan
body:
- Added support for French and Italian
- Added product library 
- Added Pro Plan option to remove the logo, use custom fields and increase the client limit
- Implemented support for two new payment providers: BeanStram and PSiGate

name: Multi-language support
body:

- Added support for German, Dutch and Brazilian Portuguese

name: Minor fixes
body:
- Improved resolution of the account logo in the PDF
- Added the option to remove the account logo
- Two GitHub developer community fixes (special thanks to topsitemakers.com and ascariandrea.com)
